name: Desert Patrolling
description:
This is an Adventure packed desert adventure with this amazing Desert Patrolling Buggy.In this game you can do variety of trails, be they serious climb over rocks or trying to navigate through thick dune sand. Chill out after a long day.

FEATURES:
• Easy simulator controls for your fingers and touch
• HD graphics and pleasing sounds.
• Extremely addictive game play
• Real life physics of driving
• Superb controls

HAVE A NICE DAY & GET SOMETIME TO PLAY. . . . …..
